ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Tech problem, any suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: I run win2k on my second machine and it runs EQ just fine.  Even using the onboard graphics card (tnt2 chip set with 16mb).  I have a win 2k partition on my
ygData.messageBody:
I run win2k on my second machine and it runs EQ just fine. Even using the
onboard graphics card (tnt2 chip set with 16mb). I have a win 2k partition
on my primary machine and it runs EQ much better then my 98 install. The
only reason I do not use it is that the sound is majorly goofed under win2k
making it hard to play.

Rokenn
